tool_description:
Convert your JSON, CSV, XML from one type to another seamlessly

Try: 
JSON to CSV
CSV to JSON
JSON to XML
XML to JSON
name: MimeTypeTransformers
title: MimeTypeTransformers

api_list.name: XML to JSON
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://mimetypetransformers.p.rapidapi.com/xml-to-json"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mimetypetransformers.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:

print(response.json())

api_list.name: CSV to JSONArray
api_list.description: You pass a csv body within a  size limit 40KiB and you get json array of objects as a response
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://mimetypetransformers.p.rapidapi.com/csv-to-jsonarray"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mimetypetransformers.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: JSONObject to XML
api_list.description: Pass a JSONObject within a size limit of 1MiB and get an XML. The XML will be wrapped in a tag called 'root'
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://mimetypetransformers.p.rapidapi.com/jsonobject-to-xml"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mimetypetransformers.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: JSONArray to CSV
api_list.description: Pass a JSON Array within a size limit of 1MiB and get CSV. Make sure the JSON Array is of only one level in depth.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://mimetypetransformers.p.rapidapi.com/jsonarray-to-csv"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mimetypetransformers.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
